=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CAFE AU LAIT Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap
Review Date: 2018/08/04
Store: Primal Elements
Product Description: ["Rich, creamy coffee aroma blended with real coffee grinds to remove cooking odors from busy chef's hands. HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant, attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap, our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth. GREAT FOR FACE & BODY – When used as a face wash, glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps, which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky, our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free, Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California, USA. GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving."]
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Primal Elements', 'Scent': 'Coffee', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.99 x 0.51 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SWCAFE', 'UPC': '640986102925'}
Review Text: Had bad experiences with glycerin soap in the past so was wary when trying this brand. However texture and fragrance exceeded expectations. Even though cupcake part falls out easily ... cant wait to try other "flavors"
Review Title: delicious scent and gentle enough for face
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: OKAY | Black Jamaican Castor Oil Conditioner | For All Hair Types & Textures | Revive - Moisturize - Grow Healthy Hair | with Argan Oil & Shea Butter | Free Of Parabens, Silicones, Sulfates | 12 Oz
Review Date: 2019/01/26
Store: Okay
Product Description: ['Stronger richer fuller hair growth needs to be properly conditioned to prevent breakage and stimulate growth. Moisture Growth Conditioner with Black Jamaican Castor Oil and Argan Oil will help hair become comparably softer and detangles brittle hair with rich hydrating ingredients. This conditioner should be used every day after shampooing. This is the 2nd step which provides conditioning therapy to help revive brittle hair.']

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Natural Ingredients**: Strong preference for natural and less toxic products, frequently mentioning the importance of avoiding synthetic chemicals and seeking out organic or cruelty-free options.

- **Fragrance**: Enjoys products with appealing scents, particularly lavender and lemon; valued for their pleasant and lasting aromas.

- **Skin & Hair Care**: Prioritizes moisturizing and gentle formulations, particularly for products related to hair conditioning and skin cleansing.

- **Product Types**: Frequently purchases a mix of hair care (especially conditioners), facial makeup (blushes and eyeshadows), and body washes/soaps, indicating a balanced interest in both makeup and skincare.

- **Brand Variety**: Expresses a willingness to explore a range of brands, often favoring those with better quality and affordability; shows brand loyalty to specific natural and health-oriented lines.

- **Quality & Performance**: Values quality over quantity and has shown a tendency to review products positively when they meet or exceed expectations for performance and scent; dislikes products with too many chemicals. 

- **Demographic Awareness**: Preference for products that suit specific skin tones, especially noting those that cater to yellow undertones and responding well to shades suited for dark hair. 

These patterns suggest a conscientious shopper who is health-conscious, values quality and scent, and seeks effective solutions in beauty and skincare without harsh chemicals.

features: HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth.|GREAT FOR FACE BODY – When used as a face wash glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use.|HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California USA.|GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving.
description: Rich, creamy coffee aroma blended with real coffee grinds to remove cooking odors from busy chef's hands. HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant, attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap, our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth. GREAT FOR FACE & BODY – When used as a face wash, glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps, which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky, our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free, Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California, USA. GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving.
